issue.title: Combine all IMU's and joints in the AtlasState message

content.raw: On the physical robot, there will be 4 independent subsystems: Atlas, the left hand, the right hand, and the head.  We expect those data streams to be delivered separately, requiring the user to do client-side synchronization, and that's the behavior that we're mimicking in simulation.  If you're looking for help with synchronizing incoming ROS messages, have a look at [message_filters](http://ros.org/wiki/message_filters#Time_Synchronizer).
